Row.Text: A [COLOR:NeutralCS]SCORE[ENDCOLOR] victory occurs if no civilization builds 20 Sanctuaries by the end of the game (after 175 turns).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]You can win a score victory with special Victory Points (VP) awarded in this scenario:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]100VP for each National Park[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]10VP for every unimproved tile of forest, marsh and rain forest in your empire.
